orange fab, this wont work on an ipod, since it has 10Frames making it High lvl 5.0 instead of the usual 4.0. It break ipod compatibility, for the sake of the same size but more quality.

For those wondering what i use to REcord. I use a Black Magic Shuttle. Requires a Pc with at least 4Cores and it records in Loseless/Raw meaning the files are huge.
2mins=2GB

Like you can set the times of when it should record or not? I'm already guessing it does not from what I have read/seen about it. Do you sit at your computer with the TV input in the card and wait for the show to come up and hit capture as soon as it starts, I know with actual TV tuner cards you can set what shows and what times to record when not even being present at the computer.
